full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YI DAM SGRUB THABS KYI RIM PA RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS PA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,MA TI LUGS KYI 'JAM DKAR SHES RAB BLO 'PHEL GYI SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES MA TI LUGS KYI 'JAM DKAR SHES RAB BLO 'PHEL GYI SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS 'DI YANG 'DI SKOR GYI RGYA BOD KYI YIG CHA MANG DU MTHONG BA'I LEGS CHA PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDUS TE DGE SLONG DHARMA BHA DRAS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
